text: That's kind of why I asked the question.  I am guilty of that too thus far.

I am thinking of trying Twilio just wanted to ask others what they like.  I want to set up some text alerts when exceptions happen in some of my apps because I don't always check the emails because the systems generate so many for normal processing.

You don't get charged for API usage, and you don't get charged to list your app on HubSpot's marketplace.

Not sure I understand this second question, you can redirect the user after they click the install app button in the marketplace and have a user go through a custom signup flow
I mean there is a good 12 inches between the text and the magnifying glass
ready for your ultra long search queries? :smile:
Pretty awesome live stream that is about to start from the Dev HUG crew. <https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ktPBeFvd4GQ>
